This weekend, we lost a #HERstory maker. Dr. Olivia Hooker was the first African-American woman to serve in the @USCG. There is no national women’s museaum, yet her story & others deserve to be commemorated in a Smithsonian Museum of American Women's History. 
We have work to do. https://twitter.com/uscg/status/1065289746384076803 QT @USCG On behalf of the men and women of the #USCG, we extend our sincere condolences to the family of Dr. Olivia Hooker, who passed away today at 103.
